entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
